title: Was Joanie Loves Shachi the most popular TV show in Korea?
subtitle: It is rumored that the '80s show Joanie Loves Shachi has scored tremendous degrees in Korea because of an unintended language issue.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: In the 1980s, the play "Johnny Loves Shachi" received tremendous ratings in Korea because of an unintended language issue.
